Footer.description: Your journey to finding a new furry friend starts here.

SignIn.title: Sign In
SignIn.useEffectErrorMessage: Please, try later or sign up - in case you are a new user.

PetCard.notFound: Pet isn't found, try again later

PetList.fetchError: Something went wrong while fetching pets, try later.

Favorites.empty: No favorite pets yet. Add some pets to your favorites!

Account.title: welcome!
Account.info: Here you can apply for a pet adoption or report a homeless pet.
Account.info2: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us via e-mail.
Account.info3: We are always happy to help our furry of human friends!

HomePage.mainText: Your journey to finding a new furry friend starts here.
HomePage.mission1: Finding Every Pet a Forever Home
HomePage.mission2: Giving Homeless Pets a Second Chance
HomePage.mission3: Making Pet Adoption Easy and Accessible
HomePage.mission4: Building a Community that Cares for Animals
HomePage.mission5: Empowering People to Save Lives Through Adoption
HomePage.unique: Every Pet is One of a Kind, Unique and Deserves Love
HomePage.aboutUsText: We are a community of pet lovers dedicated to finding homes for abandoned animals. Our platform connects potential adopters with shelters and fosters, making the process of adopting a new pet as smooth as possible.
HomePage.aboutUsText2: Our platform connects potential adopters with shelters and fosters, making the process of adopting a new pet as smooth as possible.

name.regex: Name should contain only letters, you can add your full name or short

password.min: Password is required, at least 12 characters
password.lowercase: Password should contain at least one lowercase
password.uppercase: Password should contain at least one uppercase
password.digit: Password should contain at least one digit
password.special: Password should contain at least one special char

foundAt.required: Where was the pet was found?

AdoptionForm.submitSuccess: Your adoption application has been submitted successfully!
AdoptionForm.submitError: Failed to submit application. Please try again later.
